meanings.definition: To work together in a cooperative effort to produce a combined effect greater than the sum of their separate effects.
meanings.sent1: The team is synergising to complete the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: The different departments are synergising their efforts to launch the new product successfully.
meanings.sent3: The ants were synergising to carry the food back to their nest efficiently.
meanings.sent4: The dancers were synergising their movements to create a mesmerizing performance.
meanings.sent5: The musicians synergising their instruments created a harmonious melody.
